title: Order of Eden
description: Never the hunted, always the hunter.At the beginning of time three powerful creatures devoted their lives to protecting the Garden of Eden, now their descendants have formed three separate clans that protect humankind in secret - Young Malachi was bred by his clan for a single purpose, war. As the newest Guardian of the Order of Eden, Malachi has sworn to be the shield in the shadows that defends modern humanity from an ancient and savage evil. Unfortunately, the Elders have assigned Malachi to a task force with his two most hated rivals - All three of their personalities, and abilities in combat, seem to be the exact opposite in every way. If Malachi can unite the three squabbling clans of the Order of Eden, he may just end a hidden war that has been raging since the creation of life itself. If he is to fail... Armageddon.Either way, there will be blood.
author: T.D. Orel
